comments: Coefficient of Legendre_3(x) when x^n is written in term of Legendre polynomials. - _Sean A. Irvine_, Nov 28 2012
references: H. E. Salzer, Coefficients for expressing the first twenty-four powers in terms of the Legendre polynomials, Math. Comp., 3 (1948), 16-18.
N. J. A. Sloane, A Handbook of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1973 (includes this sequence).
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
extensions: More terms from _Sean A. Irvine_, Nov 28 2012
